    3. About Us

      The Sleep Company was invented with the vision to upgrade the quality of sleep for our customers. Our Patented SmartGRID technology is one of the advanced technologies that has revolutionised the mattress industry in last 2 years. Developed by Ex-DRDO scientist, SmartGRID is the only technology which is Soft for cushioning support and Firm for pressure relief.

    4. What makes us different from the others?

      SmartGRID Technology is no memory foam, coir or latex, it is the biggest disruption in comfort technology developed by DRDO scientists keeping sleep science in mind.

      What problem are we solving?

      1/4th of people in India are sleep deprived. The Sleep Company’s vision is to change that and revolutionize the way people sleep & sit.

      Why do we love what we do?

      Good sleep is one area you don't have to worry with our mattresses. Over 1+ people have chosen our SmartGRID Technology and are happy the way their sleep has evolved over time.

        How are ratings calculated?
        To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyses reviews to verify trustworthiness.
